headline: Steven Vondran joins Ameren board of directors
summary: Ameren Corporation (NYSE: AEE) announced today that Steven O. Vondran has been elected to the Ameren board of directors, effective Jan. 1, 2025.

raw.headline: Steven Vondran joins Ameren board of directors
